subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Bernard Hopkins, the International Boxing Federation light heavyweight champion, will attempt to become the oldest boxer to unify world titles when he opposes the World Boxing Association champion Beibut Shumenov on April 19 in Washington.
snippet: Bernard Hopkins, the International Boxing Federation light heavyweight champion, will attempt to become the oldest boxer to unify world titles when he opposes the World Boxing Association champion Beibut Shumenov on April 19 in Washington.
